TopicTitle: looking to update Kommit Nucleonics rocket mod

Articles.Content:
An older Mod that had survived the updates of KPS until now....

the Kommit Nucleonics mod was a upgrade to the Nerva engine and It featured 4 Additional nuclear rockets that were useful, fun and SIMPLE...

I so not see it in the curse site for mods, nor Hae I found any information on it in KPS..

anyone have an idea about it ? I do love the LtBy 12kn engine that made my space planes exceptional to fly

wow thanks for the quick reply,

the first one the FtmN and I see there is an update

Thanks a million,

Ogre the brute force rocket engineer.
